negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi oliver, how about this proposal - I'll take the book, and you can have all of the hats and balls. I think that would be a fair split of the items. Let me know what you think!
oliver replied in round 1: Hey that sounds great. Deal

Alice said in round 2: Wonderful, I'm glad we could come to an agreement so quickly! I'll take the 1 book then, and you can have the 4 hats and 2 balls. That will be a fair split for both of us. Let's halt the negotiation here since we've reached a deal.
oliver replied in round 2: halt negotiation
